title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Child Protective Forms (Family Court Act Article 10), form 10-11b - Affidavit in support of motion to terminate placement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Child Protective Forms (Family Court Act Article 10), form 10-11b - Affidavit in support of motion to terminate placement

State Regulations
F.C.A.ยง 1062 Form 10-11b
(Child Protective-Affidavit in

Support of Motion

To Terminate Placement)
(9/2006)
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________
In the Matter of

Docket No. CIN #
A Child under Eighteen Years of

Age alleged to be

Abused Neglected by AFFIDAVIT IN SUPPORT
OF
MOTION TO
TERMINATE PLACEMENT
Respondent(s)
________
STATE OF NEW YORK)
) SS.: COUNTY OF NEW YORK), swears the following to be true under
the penalties of perjury: 1. I am the parent other interested
person[specify relationship to child]: of [specify child]: I am making this
affidavit in support of the motion to terminate the child's placement. 2. (Upon information and belief,) the
above-named child, was removed from (his)(her) home on [specify date]: and was
placed in foster care on [specify date]:, as a result of a proceeding under

Article 10 of the Family Court Act. Custody of the child remains with
[specify]: 3. I made a request to [specify social
services or agency official]: to terminate the child's placement and return the
child to my home on [specify date]:. That request was denied on [specify
date]: not granted within 30 days of my request. 4. The child's placement should be
terminated and the child should be returned to my home for the following
reasons [specify]: Form 10-11b Page 2
5. No previous application has been made
to any court or judge for this relief (except [specify]:). WHEREFORE, I respectfully request that an

Order be made herein terminating the placement of the above-named child, returning the child to my home and granting such other and further relief as
the Court may deem just and proper. ______________
Affiant

Sworn to before me this day of, ______________
(Deputy) Clerk of the Court

Notary Public

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Child Protective

Forms (Family Court Act Article 10), form
10-11b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
